dashboard.label: Machine Learning Toolkit 2.3 and 2.4
dashboard.description: Summary of Machine Learning Toolkit 2.3 and 2.4 Updates

ul.li: The Forecast Time Series assistant now allows for the selection of the ARIMA forecasting algorithm. Additional panels have been added for inspecting properties unique to ARIMA models.
Two more algorithms are introduced to support the ARIMAâ€™s parameter selection p, d, q: ACF (autocorrelation function) and PACF (partial autocorrelation function).For more information, see ARIMA
Integration of role-based access control (RBAC) for MLTK models
Entries in the "Load Existing Settings" tab are now unique per-user instead of being shared with all users. Entries created prior to version 2.3 will continue to be accessible by all users.
The ML-SPL API has been updated to make it easier for developers and partners to import custom algorithms in order to extend the capabilities of the Splunk Machine Learning Toolkit.
For more information, see ML-SPL API.
For bug fixes, see Fixed issues.
